verbs.description: [ARG1: Flight records] [V: uncovered] [ARGM-TMP: this week] show Trump ’s plane was in Moscow for more than 24 hours the weekend of a Miss Universe pageant .
Flight records uncovered this week show [ARG1: Trump ’s plane] [V: was] [ARG2: in Moscow] [ARGM-TMP: for more than 24 hours] [ARGM-TMP: the weekend of a Miss Universe pageant] .
